Title: Requires passenger cabs be inspected for carbon monoxide levels and requires information on warning signs of such to be distributed with each operator's license
Summary: Requires passenger cabs be inspected for unsafe carbon monoxide levels; requires information on the warning signs of carbon monoxide poisoning to be distributed with each operator's license, whether issued or renewed.
LawCode: Amd ยง301, add ยง397-d, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to carbon monoxide poisoning
